text: Tokorozawa Station (所沢駅,ところざわえき) is a railway station of Seibu in Tokorozawa, Saitama Prefecture, Japan. == Adjacent stations == ;Seibu : Seibu Shinjuku Line ::Koedo limited express :::Higashi-Murayama - Tokorozawa - Sayamashi ::Commuter express :::Higashi-Murayama - Tokorozawa - Shin-Tokorozawa ::Express, Semi Expless, Local :::Higashi-Murayama - Tokorozawa - Kōkū-kōen : Seibu Ikebukuro Line ::Chichibu/Musashi limited express :::Ikebukuro - Tokorozawa - Irumashi ::Rapid express :::Hibarigaoka - Tokorozawa - Kotesashi ::Express :::Hibarigaoka - Tokorozawa - Nishi-Tokorozawa ::Commuter express :::Higashi-Kurume - Tokorozawa - Nishi-Tokorozawa ::Rapid, Commuter semi express, Semi express, Local :::Akitsu - Tokorozawa - Nishi-Tokorozawa == Other websites == * Tokorozawa Station (Official Site) Category:Railway stations in Saitama Prefecture
title: Tokorozawa Station
